text: Ive been talking with boosters and I’m wondering if anybody’s parents would like to be our booster parents? Last year I was basically our parent…now that we are making the transition to the new school year it’s the perfect time for a parent to join boosters. So, if you have a parent that would like to be our booster rep please let me know :)
